Package org.rapla.components.xmlbundle

Components for storing locale-specific resources in xml-files.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    I18nBundle
    The interface provides access to a resourcebundle that can be defined in XML or as an java-object.
    LocaleChangeListener  
    LocaleSelector
    If you want to change the locales during runtime put a LocaleSelector in the base-context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompoundI18n
    Allows the combination of two resource-bundles.
    LocaleChangeEvent  

Package org.rapla.components.xmlbundle Description

Components for storing locale-specific resources in xml-files. Java Resource-Bundles can be created automatically.

For adding a new language to Rapla take a look at resources.xml.
